import React, { useState } from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faFacebook, faInstagram, faGoogle, faGithub} from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons'; import { faEnvelope, faLock, faPhone } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import logo from '../images/auth-logo.svg' import ValidateButton from '../components/validateButton' import '../css/pages/signup.scss' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' function SignUp() { const [emailData, setEmailData] = useState('') const [passwordData, setPasswordData] = useState('') const [phonedData, setPhoneData] = useState('') const submitSignup = () => { const formData = new FormData() formData.append('email', emailData) formData.append('password', passwordData) formData.append('phone', phonedData) axios.post('http://localhost:5000/signup', formData) } return (
